Pride.embed: {"title":"Pride","description":"While suffering from Burn, Poison, Paralysis, Freezing, or while Asleep, the user's Special Attack is raised 2 Combat Stages. If suffering from none of these conditions, the user loses any Combat Stages gained this way.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Dodge.embed: {"title":"Dodge","description":"The triggering Move instead misses. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Damaging Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Zen Mode.embed: {"title":"Zen Mode","description":"The user changes into Zen Mode forme for the rest of the Scene, and may use the Moves \"Flamethrower\" and \"Psychic\" as if they were on its Move List.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Cute Charm.embed: {"title":"Cute Charm","description":"The foe becomes Infatuated.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"A foe of the opposite gender attacks the user with a Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Plus.embed: {"title":"Plus","description":"The target's Special Attack is raised by +2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"An ally with Minus within 10 Meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Winter's Kiss.embed: {"title":"Winter's Kiss","description":"The user does not take damage from Ice-Type Moves. Whenever the user uses or is hit by an Ice-Type Move, the user is healed by a Tick of Hit Points. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.336"}}

Tinted Lens.embed: {"title":"Tinted Lens","description":"The user's Resisted Moves are instead Neutral. The user's Doubly Resisted Moves are instead Resisted. The user's Triply Resisted Moves are instead Double Resisted.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.333"}}

Cloud Nine.embed: {"title":"Cloud Nine","description":"The weather of the field is set to normal.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Blessed Touch.embed: {"title":"Blessed Touch","description":"An adjacent Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer gains Hit Points equal to 1\/4th of its maximum Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.312"}}

White Flame.embed: {"title":"White Flame","description":"The user may not make rolls to cure themselves from the Enraged condition. However, while Enraged, the user gains a +5 Bonus to all Damage Rolls.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Shed Skin.embed: {"title":"Shed Skin","description":"The user is cured of one of Paralysis, Freezing, Burns, Poison, or Sleep.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.329"}}

Wobble.embed: {"title":"Wobble","description":"The user may use either Counter or Mirror Coat as a Reaction, ignoring Frequency.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.336"}}

Tonguelash.embed: {"title":"Tonguelash","description":"Connection \u2014 Lick. Lick automatically Paralyzes and Flinches its target.\nBonus: The user may use Lick as if it was Normal-Typed.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits a target with Lick"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Designer.embed: {"title":"Designer","description":"The user is adept at crafting clothes for itself out of common leaves. When activating this ability to create a leaf suit, the user may choose two Types; the user resists the chosen types one step further while wearing that suit. The user may only have one leaf suit at a time, and creating a new suit destroys the old one.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Seasonal.embed:
{"title":"Seasonal","description":"The user gains an Ability based on the season.
Spring: Run Away
Summer: Grass Pelt
Autumn: Rivalry
Winter: Thick Fat","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Soothing Tone.embed: {"title":"Soothing Tone","description":"Connection - Heal Bell. Whenever the user uses a Move that targets allies, those allies gain temporary Hit Points equal to the user's Special Attack. This may affect a specific ally only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Brimstone.embed: {"title":"Brimstone","description":"Whenever the user inflicts Burn or Poison with a damaging Fire-Type or Poison-Type Attack, the target becomes both Burned and Poisoned.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Sheer Force.embed: {"title":"Sheer Force","description":"Moves with an Effect Range gain a +10 Bonus to Damage, but Effect Ranges can never be triggered.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Thick Fat.embed: {"title":"Thick Fat","description":"The user resists Fire-Type and Ice-Type attacks one step further. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.333"}}

Corrosive Toxins.embed: {"title":"Corrosive Toxins","description":"Connection - Toxic. The user may activate this Ability when using Toxic to allow the Move to ignore Immunity to the Status Affliction, Blessings, and the effects of Abilities that may prevent Hit Point loss from being Badly Poisoned (such as Magic Guard or Poison Heal).","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Mold Breaker.embed: {"title":"Mold Breaker","description":"The user ignores the effect of enemies' Defensive Abilities.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Moxie.embed: {"title":"Moxie","description":"Whenever the user's Move causes a target to faint, it may raise its Attack Combat Stage by +1. You may only trigger Moxie once per Move, even if the Move causes multiple targets to faint.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Windveiled.embed: {"title":"Windveiled","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Flying-Type attacks. If the user is hit by a Flying-Type attack, the user gains +1 Speed CS. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Freezing Point.embed: {"title":"Freezing Point","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Ice.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.318"}}

Turboblaze.embed: {"title":"Turboblaze","description":"The user's Fire-Type Attacks ignore the effect of enemies' Defensive Abilities, and if they would be resisted they deal neutral damage instead.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Drizzle.embed: {"title":"Drizzle","description":"The Weather changes to be Rainy for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Download.embed: {"title":"Download","description":"The target must reveal whether its Defense or Special Defense Stats are lower. If the Defense Stat is lower, the user gains a +1 Attack CS. If the Special Defense Stat is lower, the user instead gains +1 Special Attack CS. If both are tied, the user gains +1 CS to any Stat of their choice.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Poltergeist.embed:
{"title":"Poltergeist","description":"Rotom gains an Ability depending on what Form it has taken. If Rotom is level 40 or higher, it also may use a Move based on its Forme as if it that Move was on their Move List.
Standard Rotom: Levitate, No Move
Heat Rotom: Flash Fire, Overheat
Wash Rotom: Water Absorb, Hydro Pump
Frost Rotom: Winter's Kiss, Blizzard
Fan Rotom: Windveiled, Hurricane
Mow Rotom: Sap Sipper, Leaf Storm","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Mountain Peak.embed: {"title":"Mountain Peak","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Rock.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Limber.embed: {"title":"Limber","description":"The user is immune to Paralysis. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.322"}}

Flash Fire.embed: {"title":"Flash Fire","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Fire-Type attacks. If the user is hit by a Fire-Type attack, they gain +1 CS in their choice of Attack or Special Attack. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Sol Veil.embed: {"title":"Sol Veil","description":"The user gains +1 Evasion. This is increased to +2 Evasion while in Sunny Weather or on grassy terrain. While in Sunny Weather, the user gains +5 Damage Reduction.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Sand Force.embed: {"title":"Sand Force","description":"While on sandy terrain or in Sandstorms, the user's Ground, Rock, and Steel-Typed damaging moves deal +5 Damage.\nBonus: The user is immune to Hit Point loss from Sandstorms.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Unburden.embed: {"title":"Unburden","description":"The default state of the user's Speed is +2 Combat Stages. While holding a Held Item, the user's Speed is lowered by 2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Pure Blooded.embed: {"title":"Pure Blooded","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Dragon.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.327"}}

Sunglow.embed: {"title":"Sunglow","description":"The user may activate Sunglow while exposed to sunlight to become Radiant. As a Swift Action, the user may expend the Radiant condition to gain +2 Attack CS and +2 Accuracy for the rest of the Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Weeble.embed: {"title":"Weeble","description":"The user may make an AC4 Physical Attack against an adjacent target. If the attack hits, the target loses Hit Points equal to 1\/3rd of the damage taken by the user from the attack that triggered Weeble.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Standard Action, Reaction"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Dire Spore.embed: {"title":"Dire Spore","description":"Connection - Spore. Whenever the user hits a target with Spore, that target is also Poisoned.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Hydration.embed: {"title":"Hydration","description":"The user is cured of one Status Affliction. Hydration's Frequency is ignored if used during Rainy Weather.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Lunchbox.embed: {"title":"Lunchbox","description":"The user gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points. These Temporary Hit Points stack with any Temporary Hit Points granted by the triggering Food Buff.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user trades in a Food Buff"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Bad Dreams.embed: {"title":"Bad Dreams","description":"All Sleeping targets within 5 meters lose a Tick of Hit Points. Infiltrator.embed: {"title":"Infiltrator","description":"The user gains a +2 Bonus to Stealth Checks, does not trigger Hazards, Blessings cannot be activated in response to its actions, and the user may bypass the effects of the move Substitute.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.321"}}

Speed Boost.embed: {"title":"Speed Boost","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's Speed is raised 1 Combat Stage at the end of each of its turns. Speed Boost has no effect while out of combat.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.330"}}

Serene Grace.embed: {"title":"Serene Grace","description":"The user's Effect Range is increased by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.328"}}

Tochukaso.embed: {"title":"Tochukaso","description":"The user resists Bug-Type and Poison-Type attacks one step further. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.333"}}

Pickpocket.embed: {"title":"Pickpocket","description":"If the opponent has a Held Item and the user does not, the user takes the Held Item the opponent is holding.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by an opponent with a Melee Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Soundproof.embed: {"title":"Soundproof","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon is immune to Moves with the Sonic Keyword. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.330"}}

Lightning Kicks.embed: {"title":"Lightning Kicks","description":"The accuracy of all foes within 3 meters is reduced by -2 for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Cave Crasher.embed: {"title":"Cave Crasher","description":"The user resists Ground-Type and Rock-Type attacks one step further. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Frighten.embed: {"title":"Frighten","description":"Lower the target's Speed 2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer within 5 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.318"}}

Mini-Noses.embed: {"title":"Mini-Noses","description":"The user detaches up to three Mini-Noses from themselves and places them adjacent to them on the battlefield. These Mini-Noses have HP equal to the user's level but otherwise uses their user's stats. Each Mini- Nose has a Levitate Speed of 4. The user may Shift them each round on their turn, and they may originate any Ranged Move from one of the Mini-Noses instead of themselves if they choose. If a Mini-Nose is reduced to 0 HP, it is destroyed and takes a full 24 hours to regrow, one at a time. If the user has less than three grown Mini- Noses, then this ability can only place as many on the field as are available. All Mini-Noses deactivate, but are not destroyed, if the user is Fainted. Mini-Noses cannot be made to Shift more than 5 meters away from the user; if they are forced farther away, they will automatically Shift toward the user on the user's turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Needles.embed: {"title":"Needles","description":"Connection \u2014 Needle Arm. Whenever the user hits a target with a Physical Melee attack, that target loses a Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Leafy Cloak.embed: {"title":"Leafy Cloak","description":"Whenever the user activates Designer, theychoose two of Chlorophyll, Leaf Guard, or Overcoat. Until the user activates Designer again, they gain the chosen Abilities.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Empower.embed: {"title":"Empower","description":"The user may use a self-targeting Status-Class Move as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Shell Armor.embed: {"title":"Shell Armor","description":"The user is immune to Critical Hits; they are instead normal hits. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.329"}}

Weak Armor.embed: {"title":"Weak Armor","description":"The user may lower its Defense by 1 Combat Stage, and gain +1 Speed Combat Stage. Solid Rock.embed: {"title":"Solid Rock","description":"The user gains +5 Damage Reduction against Super-Effective damage. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Snow Cloak.embed: {"title":"Snow Cloak","description":"The user gains +1 Evasion. This is increased to +2 Evasion while in Hail or snowy terrain. While in Hail, the user and adjacent allies do not lose Hit Points due to the Hail.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Poison Touch.embed: {"title":"Poison Touch","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's Moves which deal damage Poison Legal Targets on 19+. If a move already has a chance of Poisoning foes, Poison Touch increases the effect range by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Forest Lord.embed: {"title":"Forest Lord","description":"This turn, the user may originate a Grass or Ghost-Typed Move from any fully grown tree within 10 meters. Defeatist.embed: {"title":"Defeatist","description":"The user gain a +2d6 Bonus to Damage Rolls while over 50% of its Maximum Hit Points. While at 50% Max Hit Points or lower, the user gains a -5 penalty to Damage Rolls and +10 Initiative.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Effect Spore.embed: {"title":"Effect Spore","description":"Roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the attacker is Poisoned. On a result of 3 or 4, the attacker is Paralyzed. On a result of 5 or 6, the attacker falls Asleep.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Gore.embed: {"title":"Gore","description":"Connection - Horn Attack. Horn Attack gains the Double Strike keyword, and pushes its target 2 meters.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 - Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"The user uses Horn Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Honey Paws.embed: {"title":"Honey Paws","description":"The user may consume Honey to gain a Food Buff as if they had consumed Leftovers. This Food Buff does not count against their normal limit.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Water Absorb.embed: {"title":"Water Absorb","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Water-Type attacks, and whenever they are hit with a Water Type attack, they gain a Tick of Hit Points. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Enduring Rage.embed: {"title":"Enduring Rage","description":"The user may not make rolls to cure themselves from the Enraged condition. However, while Enraged, the user gains 5 Damage Reduction.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Aura Storm.embed: {"title":"Aura Storm","description":"For each injury the user has, they gain a +3 Bonus to Damage Rolls.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Interference.embed: {"title":"Interference","description":"The accuracy of all foes within 3 meters is reduced by -2 for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Spinning Dance.embed: {"title":"Spinning Dance","description":"If not Fainted, Paralyzed, or Asleep, the user gains +1 Evasion and may immediately Shift 1 meter.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is targeted by an attack, but is missed"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.330"}}

Blaze.embed: {"title":"Blaze","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Fire.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.312"}}

Odious Spray.embed: {"title":"Odious Spray","description":"Connection - Poison Gas. The user may use Poison Gas as if it had a Range \"8, 1 Target\", an AC of 2, and Flinched its target when it hit.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Dream Smoke.embed: {"title":"Dream Smoke","description":"The attacking foe falls Asleep.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"The user is hit by a Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Trinity.embed: {"title":"Trinity","description":"Connection - Tri Attack. You may use Tri Attack as if it had a range of \"Melee, 3 Targets\". Make a different attack roll for each target. If Tri-Attack's effect range is activated, do not roll for the effect; the first target can only be Frozen, the second can only be Burned, and the third can only be Paralyzed. Additionally, you may use Tri-Attack as a Physical Attack if you wish.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Simple.embed: {"title":"Simple","description":"When the Pok\u00e9mon's Combat Stages are altered, double the amount of Combat Stages they are raised or lowered.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.329"}}

Honey Thief.embed: {"title":"Honey Thief","description":"Connection - Bug Bite. If the user uses Bug Bite to steal the effects of a Digestion Buff, they gain a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

Crush Trap.embed: {"title":"Crush Trap","description":"Connection \u2014 Wrap. When you activate this ability, the user may immediately deal damage to the target as if the user had hit with a Struggle Attack. There is no Accuracy Roll and thus this damage cannot miss, be a Critical Hit, or trigger any Effect Ranges.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user successfully Grapples a target"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Leaf Rush.embed: {"title":"Leaf Rush","description":"The user may activate Leaf Rush to use a Grass-Type Move with Priority. If the Move is a Damaging Move, the user adds half their Speed Stat to the Damage Roll.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 - Free Action, Priority"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Landslide.embed: {"title":"Landslide","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Ground.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.322"}}

Minus.embed: {"title":"Minus","description":"The target's Special Attack is raised by +2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An ally with Plus within 10 Meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Rain Dish.embed: {"title":"Rain Dish","description":"The user gains a Tick of Hit Points. Rain Dish may only be used while the user is under 50% Hit Points or in Rainy Weather.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x5 - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Lullaby.embed: {"title":"Lullaby","description":"Connection - Sing. Whenever the user uses the Move \"Sing\", they may activate this Feature. Shell Cannon.embed: {"title":"Shell Cannon","description":"When Blastoise uses Aqua Jet, Dive, Flash Cannon, Hydro Cannon, Hydro Pump, Tackle, Waterfall, Water Gun, and Water Spout they may activate this Ability to gain +2 to their Accuracy Roll and deals +4 Bonus Damage with Damage Rolls. Pressure.embed: {"title":"Pressure","description":"All foes within 3 meters are Suppressed for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Cherry Power.embed: {"title":"Cherry Power","description":"The user gains 15 Temporary Hit Points, and is cured of all Persistent Status Afflictions.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Fluffy Charge.embed: {"title":"Fluffy Charge","description":"Connection \u2014 Charge. Whenever the user uses Charge, they gain +1 CS to Defense.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.317"}}

Aftermath.embed: {"title":"Aftermath","description":"The user creates a Burst 1. Everything in the Burst loses three Ticks of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user becomes Fainted"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Motor Drive.embed: {"title":"Motor Drive","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Electric Type attacks. Whenever an Electric Type attack hits the Pok\u00e9mon, raise their Speed by +1 Combat Stage. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Heliovolt.embed: {"title":"Heliovolt","description":"For 1 full round, the user gains +1 Evasion and is considered to be in Sunny Weather.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses an Electric-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Sprint (Ability).embed: {"title":"Sprint (Ability)","description":"The user gains +2 Speed Combat Stages.\nBonus: The user's Overland Speed is increased by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses the Sprint Action during Combat"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Early Bird.embed: {"title":"Early Bird","description":"The user gains a bonus to Initiative equal to half its Speed, and a +3 Bonus on Save Checks against Sleep.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Pickup.embed: {"title":"Pickup","description":"You may use Pickup as an Extended Action that requires at least 5 minutes. Roll 1d20, consult the Pickup keyword to figure out what you find!","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Heavy Metal.embed: {"title":"Heavy Metal","description":"The user's Weight Class is increased by +2. Their Defense Base Stat is increased by +2, but their Speed Base Stat is decreased by 2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Hustle.embed: {"title":"Hustle","description":"The user receives a -2 penalty to all Accuracy Rolls and gains a +10 Bonus to All Damage Rolls.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Shadow Tag.embed: {"title":"Shadow Tag","description":"The target's shadow becomes pinned to the target's current spot for 5 turns. During this time, the target is Slowed and Trapped, and cannot move more than 5 meters from the spot their shadow is pinned to; even being Pushed and other forced movement effects cannot force the target to Move more than 5 meters from that spot.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An adjacent Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.329"}}

Rattled.embed: {"title":"Rattled","description":"The user's Speed is raised by +1 Combat Stage, and may immediately Disengage as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Blow Away.embed: {"title":"Blow Away","description":"Connection - Whirlwind. When the user uses Whirlwind, all targets hit are pushed an additional 2 meters and lose a Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Snuggle.embed: {"title":"Snuggle","description":"The user and the target each gain two ticks of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An adjacent target"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Pumpkingrab.embed: {"title":"Pumpkingrab","description":"The user automatically Grapples an adjacent foe and gains dominance.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Harvest.embed: {"title":"Harvest","description":"Whenever the user trades in a Digestion Buff from a Berry, flip a coin. On heads, the user gains all the benefits of the Digestion Buff, but the Buff is not used up. On tails, the Buff is consumed normally. While in Sunny Weather, the Buff is never consumed. The user may trade in a Digestion Buff up to once per turn during an encounter, but only until they flip \"Tails\".","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.319"}}

Protean.embed: {"title":"Protean","description":"The user's Type changes to match the Type of the triggering Move. This Ability resolves before the Move is resolved (And thus you may apply STAB, and trigger other Features and Abilities appropriately).","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses a Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.327"}}

Dreamspinner.embed: {"title":"Dreamspinner","description":"All Sleeping Foes within 3 meters lose a Tick of Hit Points, and the user gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Soulstealer.embed: {"title":"Soulstealer","description":"The user removes one Injury from themselves and gains Hit Points equal to 25% of their Max Hit Points. If the triggering attack killed its target, the user instead removes all Injuries and recovers Hit Points equal to 50% of the user's Max Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user's attack causes a foe to Faint"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Fur Coat.embed: {"title":"Fur Coat","description":"The user resists all Physical Attacks one step further. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.319"}}

Silk Threads.embed: {"title":"Silk Threads","description":"Connection - String Shot. Whenever the user uses String Shot, all targets hit become Slowed and Vulnerable for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Tingle.embed: {"title":"Tingle","description":"The target loses a Tick of Hit Points and takes a -5 penalty to Damage Rolls for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits an adjacent target foe with a 1-Target attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Oblivious.embed: {"title":"Oblivious","description":"The user is immune to the Enraged and Infatuated conditions. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.325"}}

Abominable.embed: {"title":"Abominable","description":"The user's Base HP is increased by +5. Additionally, the user ignores the Recoil Keyword when attacking.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.311"}}

Deadly Poison.embed: {"title":"Deadly Poison","description":"The target is Badly Poisoned instead.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user Poisons a target"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.315"}}

Exploit.embed: {"title":"Exploit","description":"Whenever you deal Super-Effective Damage to a target, that target treats your Damage Roll as it were increased by +5.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.317"}}

Desert Weather.embed: {"title":"Desert Weather","description":"The user is immune to Sandstorm Damage, resists Fire-Type Moves in Sunny Weather, and gains a Tick of Temporary Hit Points at the end of each of its turns while in Rainy Weather.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Sand Veil.embed: {"title":"Sand Veil","description":"The user gains +1 Evasion. This is increased to +2 Evasion while in a Sandstorm or sandy terrain. While in a Sandstorm, the user and adjacent allies do not lose Hit Points due to the Sandstorm.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Blur (Ability).embed: {"title":"Blur (Ability)","description":"Attacks and Moves targeting you that don't require an Accuracy Check now require one, as though they had an Accuracy Check of 2. You may only apply half of your Evasion to these Attacks and Moves. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.312"}}

Snow Warning.embed: {"title":"Snow Warning","description":"The Weather changes to Hail for 5 rounds. As a static effect the user is not damaged by Hail.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.330"}}

Strange Tempo.embed: {"title":"Strange Tempo","description":"While Confused, the user may choose either to 1) As a Free Action, not to roll for Confusion, instead acting normally or 2) As a Standard Action, cure themselves of Confusion and gain +2 Combat Stages to the Stat of their choice.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Run Away.embed: {"title":"Run Away","description":"The user does not provoke Attacks of Opportunity by Shifting. The user cannot be Trapped.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Poison Point.embed: {"title":"Poison Point","description":"The attacking foe is Poisoned","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Melee Move."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Leek Mastery.embed: {"title":"Leek Mastery","description":"Connection - Acrobatics. If the user is holding a Rare Leek, they may still use Acrobatics as if they were not holding an item. The user cannot be disarmed of their Stick, nor can be it be forcefully removed by Trick, Switcheroo, Thief, or any other Moves or effects unless the user wishes it.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.322"}}

Prankster.embed: {"title":"Prankster","description":"The user may use Status Moves as Priority (Advanced).","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Water Veil.embed: {"title":"Water Veil","description":"The user is immune to Burns. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Overgrow.embed: {"title":"Overgrow","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Grass.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.325"}}

Teravolt.embed: {"title":"Teravolt","description":"The user's Electric-Type Attacks ignore the effect of enemies' Defensive Abilities, and if they would be resisted they deal neutral damage instead.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Damp.embed: {"title":"Damp","description":"Whenever anyone within 10 meters would use the Moves Self-Destruct or Explosion or activate the Aftermath Ability, those effects fail and instead do nothing.\nBonus: The user gains a +1d10 Bonus to Damage Rolls with Water-Typed Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Aura Break.embed: {"title":"Aura Break","description":"The foe reveals its abilities. Pick one ability; any Damage Bonuses (either Damage Base increases or Damage Roll bonuses) granted by the ability instead become Damage Penalties of the same value.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A foe within 6 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Normalize.embed: {"title":"Normalize","description":"The user's attacks cannot deal Super-Effective or Resisted Damage; they instead resolve as if dealing Neutral Damage. The user also takes neutral damage from all attacks to which they are not immune. This does not affect Immunities.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Dry Skin.embed: {"title":"Dry Skin","description":"Whenever the user is hit by a damaging Fire- Type Move or ends their turn in Sunny Weather, they lose a Tick of Hit Points. The user is immune to the damage and effects of Water-Type Moves, and whenever the user is hit by a damaging Water-Type Move or ends their turn in Rainy Weather, they gain a Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Lancer.embed: {"title":"Lancer","description":"During their turn, if the user Shifts at least 3 meters, they gain a +3 Bonus to Critical Hit Range until the beginning of their next turn. If they do not Shift or Disengage at all, they gain +5 Damage Reduction until the beginning of their next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Chlorophyll.embed: {"title":"Chlorophyll","description":"While in Sunny Weather or under 50% Max Hit Points, the user's Initiative is doubled.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Danger Syrup.embed: {"title":"Danger Syrup","description":"Connection - Sweet Scent. When this Ability is activated the user may use Sweet Scent as a Free Action, ignoring Frequency. Whenever the user hits a foe with Sweet Scent, that foe is Blinded for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by an attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Liquid Ooze.embed: {"title":"Liquid Ooze","description":"This user resists Poison-Type Damage one step further. Additionally, when this user is damaged by Absorb, Drain Punch, Giga Drain, Horn Leech, Leech Life, or Mega Drain, that Move gains Recoil 1\/2 and the Move's user does not gain any HP. If the user is hit by Leech Seed, the user does not lose Hit Points from Leech Seed; instead Leech Seed's user loses Hit Points equal to this user's Tick Value.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Copy Master.embed: {"title":"Copy Master","description":"Connection - Copycat. Whenever the user uses Copycat or Mimic, it gains +1 Combat Stage in a Stat of its choice after the Move is resolved.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Parental Bond.embed: {"title":"Parental Bond","description":"Only Kangaskhan with the Baby Template can be Mega Evolved and gain this Ability. While they have this Ability, the Baby gains 10 Damage Reduction, and will leave its mother's pouch and may be commanded to take action in battle. Both the Baby Kangaskhan with this Ability and its Mother may take their turn when the Mother takes its turn; the Baby will not willingly walk farther than 10 meters from its mother however. If the Baby Kangaskhan with this Ability is Fainted, its mother will become Enraged, and gain 5 Damage Reduction and +5 to Damage Rolls for the remainder of the Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.325"}}

Starswirl.embed: {"title":"Starswirl","description":"Connection \u2014 Rapid Spin. The user may activate this Ability to user Rapid Spin as a Swift Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Imposter.embed: {"title":"Imposter","description":"If the user is not Transformed, they may use Transform as a Free-Action Interrupt.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Flying Fly Trap.embed: {"title":"Flying Fly Trap","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon takes no damage from Ground Type Moves and Bug Type Moves. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.318"}}

Sap Sipper.embed: {"title":"Sap Sipper","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Grass-Type attacks. If the user is hit by a Grass-Type attack, they gain +1 CS in their choice of Attack or Special Attack. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Swarm.embed: {"title":"Swarm","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Bug.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.332"}}

Root Down.embed: {"title":"Root Down","description":"Connection - Ingrain. While the user has the Ingrain Coat, they may activate this Ability to gain 5 Damage Reduction.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Shift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Sticky Hold.embed: {"title":"Sticky Hold","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's held items cannot be stolen, switched, destroyed or dropped.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Wallmaster.embed: {"title":"Wallmaster","description":"Connection \u2014 Barrier. Whenever the user uses Barrier, they may choose to either gain +2 Defense Combat Stages, or place 2 additional segments of Barrier.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Super Luck.embed: {"title":"Super Luck","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's Moves are Critical Hits on 18-20. If a Move already has an extended Critical Hit range, Super Luck extends that range by 2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.332"}}

Iron Barbs.embed: {"title":"Iron Barbs","description":"The attacker loses Hit Points equal to Tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action, Reaction"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.321"}}

Filter.embed: {"title":"Filter","description":"The user gains +5 Damage Reduction against Super- Effective damage. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Stall.embed: {"title":"Stall","description":"In a round's queue, a Pok\u00e9mon with Stall is always last. If a Pok\u00e9mon goes to the end of the queue, the Pok\u00e9mon with Stall is still the last to move. The user's actions taken on their Initiative Count (not Priority or Interrupt) cannot be Interrupted.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Eggscellence.embed: {"title":"Eggscellence","description":"Connection \u2014 Barrage. The user receives STAB when using Barrage and Egg Bomb. If Normal Typed, these Moves deal Damage as if one step more effective on 16+.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Giver.embed: {"title":"Giver","description":"Connection - Present. After rolling to determine Present's Damage Base, you may choose to ignore the roll and act as if you had rolled a 1 or a 5.\nBonus: The user may know any number of TM and Tutor Moves, instead of a maximum of three.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Ragelope.embed: {"title":"Ragelope","description":"The user's Physical Attacks gain the following Effect Range: On 18+, the user becomes Enraged and gains +1 Speed CS. If the user is already Enraged, they gain +1 Attack CS instead.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.13"}}

Diamond Defense.embed: {"title":"Diamond Defense","description":"Connection - Stealth Rock. Stealth Rock's Frequency is Scene x2, and the user's Stealth Rocks can be treated as dealing Rock-Type or Fairy-Type Damage, whichever is more effective.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.315"}}

Tangled Feet.embed: {"title":"Tangled Feet","description":"While Confused or Slowed, the user gains +3 Evasion. The user is immune to the Vulnerable Condition.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Swift Swim.embed: {"title":"Swift Swim","description":"While in Rainy Weather or under 50% Max Hit Points, the user's Initiative is doubled.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Wash Away.embed: {"title":"Wash Away","description":"Before the Move \"hits\", all Combat Stages on targets hit by the Move are reset to their default (usually 0), and all coats on the targets, except ones placed by Water Sport, are destroyed.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits with a Water Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Toxic Boost.embed: {"title":"Toxic Boost","description":"The user gains +3 Attack and Special Attack Combat Stages. Toxic Boost may only be used while Poisoned or Badly Poisoned.\nSpecial:If the user has the Immunity Ability, they can still become Poisoned and Badly Poisoned but do not lose Hit Points from these conditions.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Static.embed: {"title":"Static","description":"The attacking foe becomes Paralyzed.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Klutz.embed: {"title":"Klutz","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon ignores the effects of all held Items in its possession. The user may drop Held Items At-Will as a Free Action during their turn, even if they have Status Afflictions that prevent them from taking actions.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.322"}}

Keen Eye.embed: {"title":"Keen Eye","description":"The user's Accuracy cannot be lowered, their attacks cannot have Accuracy Penalties (such as from Illuminate), the user is immune to the Blind condition (but not Total Blindness), and the user ignores any Evasion not directly derived from Stats (such as from the Instinct Ability, or from moves like Minimize).","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.321"}}

Fade Away.embed: {"title":"Fade Away","description":"The user becomes Invisible until the beginning of their next turn, and may immediately Shift. This Ability may be activated as an Interrupt when hit by a Physical attack; the user may declare the use of Fade Away to avoid all damage and\/or effects of the move. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.317"}}

Flower Gift.embed: {"title":"Flower Gift","description":"Flower Gift may only be used if the Weather is Sunny or if the user is under 50% Hit Points. When activated, the user may pick two Stats, gaining +2 Combat Stages in each Stat. All targets within 2 meters also gain +1 Combat Stage in each of the chosen Stats.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Dig Away.embed: {"title":"Dig Away","description":"Connection - Dig. When hit by a Move, this Pok\u00e9mon may activate this Feature to use Dig, frequency allowing, as an interrupt to avoid the attack and shift underground immediately. This consumes a command as normal. The terrain must allow for Dig to be used.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Ice Body.embed: {"title":"Ice Body","description":"The user gains a Tick of Hit Points. Ice Body may only be used while the user is under 50% Hit Points or in Hailing Weather.\nBonus: The user is immune to Hit Point loss from Hail","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x5 - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Rock Head.embed: {"title":"Rock Head","description":"The user ignores the Recoil keyword when attacking. If the user moves at least 4 meters in a straight line towards a foe before attacking that foe with a physical attack, they may add a +2d6 Bonus to the Damage Roll against that foe.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Wonder Guard.embed: {"title":"Wonder Guard","description":"Only damaging attacks that are Super-Effective affect the Pok\u00e9mon with Wonder Guard; all other damaging attacks cannot hit the user or deal damage. Wonder Guard loses its effect if the user has no weaknesses. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.336"}}

Regenerator.embed: {"title":"Regenerator","description":"The user gains Hit Points equal to 1\/3rd of its maximum Hit Points. Regenerator may be activated only once per Scene.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is recalled into a Pok\u00e9 Ball, or Takes a Breather"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.328"}}

Dark Art.embed: {"title":"Dark Art","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Dark.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.315"}}

Illuminate.embed: {"title":"Illuminate","description":"Attacks that target the user have a -2 Accuracy Penalty against the user. Does not affect attackers with the Blindsense Capability. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

Sequence.embed: {"title":"Sequence","description":"For every Electric-Type Pok\u00e9mon adjacent to the user, the triggering Attack deals an additional +3 Damage.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses an Electric Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Competitive.embed: {"title":"Competitive","description":"Whenever the user has its Combat Stages lowered, by something other than its own Moves or Abilities, the user's Special Attack is raised 2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Juicy Energy.embed: {"title":"Juicy Energy","description":"Instead of gaining 30 Hit Points, the user gains Hit Points equal to their Level","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user trades in a Berry Juice Food Buff"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.12"}}

Steadfast.embed: {"title":"Steadfast","description":"The user's Speed is raised by +1 Combat Stage. Bonus: The user's Initiative is increased by +5.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user would be Flinched"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Justified.embed: {"title":"Justified","description":"The user may raise its Attack by +1 Combat Stage. Bonus: The user always gains a +4 bonus to Skill Checks made to Intercept.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging Dark Type Move or Attack of Opportunity"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Cluster Mind.embed: {"title":"Cluster Mind","description":"The user's Move Pool limit is increased by +2.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Defiant.embed: {"title":"Defiant","description":"Whenever the user has its Combat Stages lowered, by something other than its own Moves or Abilities, the user's Attack is raised 2 Combat Stages.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.315"}}

Shackle.embed: {"title":"Shackle","description":"Shackle creates a Burst 3. All foes in the burst have their movement capabilities halved until the end of their next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Trace.embed: {"title":"Trace","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon gains an Ability known by the Target for the remainder of the encounter, or until it is Fainted.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Trainer or Pok\u00e9mon within 10 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.333"}}

Air Lock.embed: {"title":"Air Lock","description":"The weather is set to normal as long as the Pok\u00e9mon with Air Lock wants it to remain that way. The user may continue to sustain this effect as a Swift Action each round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.311"}}

Mimitree.embed: {"title":"Mimitree","description":"Connection - Mimic. Whenever the user uses a Move copied by Mimic, they may choose to replace that Move with Mimic once more. When used this way, the user ignores Mimic's Frequency.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.323"}}

Spray Down.embed: {"title":"Spray Down","description":"The triggering attack's target is knocked down to ground level, and loses all Sky or Levitate Speeds for 3 turns. During this time, they may be hit by Ground-Type Moves even if normally immune.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2- Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits an airborne target with a ranged 1-target attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Berserk.embed: {"title":"Berserk","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":" The user\u2019s drops to half HP or below for the first time in an encounter, or becomes Enraged"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user receives +1 Special Attack Combat Stage."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.1"}}

Chemical Romance.embed: {"title":"Chemical Romance","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Connection \u2013 Sweet Scent. Whenever the user hits a male target with Poison Gas, Smog, Sweet Scent, Toxic, or Venom Drench, that target becomes Infatuated with the user."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Dazzling.embed: {"title":"Dazzling","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" An Adjacent Foe"},{"name":"Effect","value":" For the rest of the Scene, the target's Initiative is lowered by 10 and cannot use Priority Moves."},{"name":"Bonus","value":" Interrupt Moves may not be declared in response to the user's actions."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Beast Boost.embed: {"title":"Beast Boost","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":" The user\u2019s Damaging Attack causes an opponent to Faint"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user receives +1 Combat Stage in their highest non-HP stat."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.1"}}

Disguise.embed: {"title":"Disguise","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":" The user is hit by a Damaging Move."},{"name":"Effect","value":" The triggering attack instead misses and has no effect. The user then gains +1 CS in a Stat of their choice. Defensive."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Electric Surge.embed: {"title":"Electric Surge","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The Field becomes Electrified, as if affected by the Move Electric Terrain, for one full round."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Galvanize.embed: {"title":"Galvanize","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":" The user uses a Normal-Type damaging Move"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The Move is changed to be Electric-Type."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Dancer (Ability).embed: {"title":"Dancer","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":" Someone within 10 meters uses a Status- Class Dance Move"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user may immediately use the triggering Move as a Free Action."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Healer.embed: {"title":"Healer","description":"The target is cured of all Status conditions.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"An Adjacent Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.319"}}

Adaptability.embed: {"title":"Adaptability","description":"The user gains a +1d10 Bonus to Damage Rolls with Moves with which they apply STAB.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Battery.embed: {"title":"Battery","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":" An Adjacent Ally"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The target's next Special Attack deals +2d6+4 damage. If that attack is Electric-Typed, it deals +3d6+6 more damage instead."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.1"}}

Comatose.embed: {"title":"Comatose","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2013 Move Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user falls Asleep, and regains a Tick of Hit Points."},{"name":"Bonus","value":" The user may act normally while Asleep and ignores all other penalties from being Asleep. While Asleep, the user does not make Save Checks to wake up, and wakes up from being hit only if they want to."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Corrosion.embed: {"title":"Corrosion","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user's Poison-Type attacks are resisted one step less, and deal damage to Immune targets as if they were doubly resisted. The user may Poison and Badly Poison Steel and Poison-Type Poke\u0301mon."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Volt Absorb.embed: {"title":"Volt Absorb","description":"The user is immune to the damage and effects of Electric-Type attacks, and whenever they are hit with an Electric Type attack, they gain Hit Points equal to a Tick of Hit Points. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Fluffy.embed: {"title":"Fluffy","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user resists damaging Melee attacks one step further, but resists Fire-Type attacks one step less. Defensive."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Full Metal Body.embed: {"title":"Full Metal Body","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user\u2019s Combat Stages may not be lowered by the effect of foes\u2019 Features, Abilities, or Moves. Status Afflictions may still alter their Combat Stages. Defensive."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.2"}}

Emergency Exit.embed: {"title":"Emergency Exit","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":" When the user\u2019s Hit Points drop below half their maximum, their trainer may immediately recall the user and send out another Poke\u0301mon as a Free Action. {"title":"Leaf Gift","description":"The user is adept at crafting clothes for itself out of common leaves. Nourishing Suit - Effect: Grants the Sun Blanket and Leaf Guard Abilities.
Heavy Suit - Effect: Grants the Sturdy and Overcoat Abilities.
Vibrant Suit - Effect: Grants the Chlorophyll and Photosynthesis Abilities.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily — Extended Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.322"}}

Cruelty.embed:
{"title":"Cruelty","description":"After Damage is Resolved, the foe gains an Injury. The user is then informed of the total number of Injuries currently on the target, and may use that number to "purchase" the effects listed below.
» 1 Injury: The target loses 2 Hit Points. May be "purchased" multiple times.
» 1 Injury: The target is Slowed.
» 2 Injuries: Until the end of the encounter, the target may not gain Hit Points or Temporary Hit Points from any source. This effect ends if the target is switched out or Takes a Breather.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene — Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits a foe with a damaging attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.314"}}

Illusion (Ability).embed: {"title":"Illusion (Ability)","description":"As a Standard Action, the user may mark an object, Pok\u00e9mon, or Trainer. The user may have a number of targets marked equal to their Focus Rank; to mark a new target, an old mark must be forfeited. Once per round as a Free Action, the user may use illusory powers to make itself look exactly like a marked target. This may be done as the user is being released from a Pok\u00e9 Ball. This change is aesthetic and does not affect typing or Moves. The illusion allows the user to vaguely mimic sounds made by its marked target, but it is not capable of intelligible speech. Whenever the user is hit by a damaging Move, the Illusion is destroyed. The user may also dismiss the Illusion as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Special"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.321"}}

Regal Challenge.embed: {"title":"Regal Challenge","description":"Ask the target if they will show deference or defiance. Contrary.embed: {"title":"Contrary","description":"If something would raise the user's Combat Stages, it instead lowers the user's Combat Stages by the same amount.
