Mud Shield.embed: {"title":"Mud Shield","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2013 Swift Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user gains two ticks worth of Temporary Hit Points."},{"name":"Bonus","value":" When standing on any muddy or dirty terrain that is either Slow or Rough Terrain, the user gains +5 Damage Reduction. Defensive."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.3"}}

Symbiosis.embed: {"title":"Symbiosis","description":"Choose One: Connection \u2014 Teleport. You activate Teleporter as if your Teleporter value were three times its normal value; or you may take one willing adjacent Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer along with you as you teleport so long as you are touching them when you activate Transporter. You may expend two uses of Transporter at once to choose both effects.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You Teleport"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Stance Change.embed: {"title":"Stance Change","description":"Aegislash has two Stances: Shield Stance and Sword Stance. Its default Stance is Shield Stance. Whenever Aegislash uses a damaging attack, it switches to Sword Stance and swaps its Attack Stat with its Defense and its Special Attack Stat with its Special Defense, without changing Combat Stages. Whenever Aegislash uses King's Shield, Protect, a Status Move that raises Defense Combat Stages, or a Blessing, it switches to Shield Stance and swaps its offensive and defensive Stats back to their original arrangement. Aegislash may also change its Stance as a Full Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.331"}}

Color Theory.embed: {"title":"Color Theory","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"description":"Upon gaining this ability at Birth, the user rolls 1d12 to determine the color of their tail secretions. 1 = Red; 2 = Red-Orange; 3 = Orange; 4 = Yellow- Orange; 5 = Yellow; 6 = Yellow-Green; 7 = Green; 8 = Blue-Green; 9 = Blue; 10 = Blue-Violet; 11 = Violet; 12 = Red-Violet.\n\nRed is tied to Attack, Orange is tied to Defense, Yellow is tied to Special Attack, Green is tied to Special Defense, Blue is tied to Speed, Violet is tied to HP. Users with a \u201cPure\u201d Color (Red, Orange, Yellow, etc) gain a +6 Bonus to the Base Stat tied to their color. Users with a \u201cMixed\u201d Color (Red-Orange, Yellow-Orange, etc) gain a +3 Bonus to each Stat tied to the color.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Truant.embed: {"title":"Truant","description":"At the beginning of each of its turns, the user must roll 1d20. On a roll of 7 or lower, the target refuses to act; they heal a Tick of Hit Points, and do not get a Standard Action that turn. Turns in which the user refuses to act count towards turns used up by Interrupts or the Exhausted Condition, and the user may make Rolls to cure themselves from Status Effects with a +3 Bonus that turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.334"}}

Discipline.embed: {"title":"Discipline","description":"If the user gains initiative and is Confused, Enraged, Infatuated, or Flinched, they may activate Discipline to cure themselves of any of these conditions.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.316"}}

Anticipation.embed: {"title":"Anticipation","description":"The target reveals if they have any Moves that are Super-Effective against the Pok\u00e9mon with Anticipation. You may not target a Pok\u00e9mon or Trainer more than once per encounter with Anticipation. Anticipation only reveals whether the opponent does or does not have those moves, not the specific moves themselves.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"Pok\u00e9mon or Trainers"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.311"}}

Anchored.embed: {"title":"Anchored","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Dhelmise has an Anchor token on the field, which occupies one square as if it is Medium sized but is otherwise ignored for cover and targeting. Dhelmise cannot move or be moved more than 3 meters away from its Anchor, willingly or otherwise. The Anchor token itself cannot be pushed, pulled, or moved against Dhelmise's will in any way. Dhelmise may shift their Anchor Token as a Swift Action, moving it to any open space within 3 meters of itself. Bonus: When the user Shifts the Anchor, it may immediately afterwards originate an attack from its Anchor if it has the appropriate action available, giving that attack the following properties: the attack's range changes to \"Melee, 1 Target\", the attack deals +2d6 damage, and the attack's Class changes to Physical if it wasn't already."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.1"}}

Quick Curl.embed: {"title":"Quick Curl","description":"Connection - Defense Curl. The user may activate this Ability to use Defense Curl as an Standard Action Interrupt and gain +10 Damage Reduction for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Prime Fury.embed: {"title":"Prime Fury","description":"The user becomes Enraged, and gains +1 Combat Stage in each of Attack and Special Attack.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.8"}}

Sway.embed: {"title":"Sway","description":"The triggering attack misses the user and hits the foe that made the attack instead. That foe may then be pushed to any empty square adjacent to the user.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action, Interrupt"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging Melee attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.332"}}

Big Pecks.embed: {"title":"Big Pecks","description":"The user cannot have its Defense Stat lowered. The user cannot have its Defense Combat Stages lowered. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.312"}}

Dust Cloud.embed: {"title":"Dust Cloud","description":"Connection - Poison Powder. The user may use Moves with the Powder Keyword as if they had a Range of \"Burst 1\".","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Serpent's Mark.embed:
{"title":"Serpent's Mark","description":"Arbok's Advanced and High Abilities depend on the Arbok's hood pattern. To determine its pattern, roll 1d6 upon evolution or upon generation. If an Arbok is bred, it will have the same pattern as its parent. If both parents are Arboks with different patterns, flip a coin to decide which pattern is inherited.
Pattern Name - Adv Ability / High Ability
Attack Pattern - Strong Jaw / Guts
Crush Pattern - Crush Trap / Frisk
Fear Pattern - Unnerve / Regal Challenge
Life Pattern - Regenerator / Defy Death
Speed Pattern - Run Away / Speed Boost
Stealth Pattern - Infiltrator / Ambush","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

Suction Cups.embed: {"title":"Suction Cups","description":"The user gains +5 Damage Reduction for 1 full round.\nBonus:The user is immune to Push effects. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Shift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Thermosensitive.embed: {"title":"Thermosensitive","description":"While Sunny, the user's Attack and Special Attack are raised by +2 combat stages each. While Hailing, the user's movement capabilities are reduced by half.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.333"}}

Moody.embed: {"title":"Moody","description":"At the end of the user's turn, roll 1d6 to determine a Stat to be raised by +2 Combat Stages, then roll 1d6 to determine a Stat to be lowered by 1 Combat Stage. 1 is Attack, 2 is Defense, 3 is Special Attack, 4 is Special Defense, 5 is Speed, and 6 is Accuracy.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Sturdy.embed: {"title":"Sturdy","description":"The user is immune to Moves with the Execute Keyword. If a single source of Damage or Hit Point Loss would cause the user to lose more than X Hit Points, the damage or Hit Point loss is instead reduced to X. X is equal to 50% of their Max Hit Points. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Pixilate.embed: {"title":"Pixilate","description":"The Move is changed to be Fairy-Type.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses a Normal-Type damaging Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Hypnotic.embed: {"title":"Hypnotic","description":"Connection - Hypnosis. When used by the user, Hypnosis cannot miss.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

White Smoke.embed: {"title":"White Smoke","description":"The user's Combat Stages, Evasion, or Accuracy may not be lowered except by the user's own Moves and effects. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Bone Wielder.embed: {"title":"Bone Wielder","description":"The user's Bone Club, Bonemerang, and Bone Rush Moves ignore immunity against Ground-Type Moves.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Unaware.embed: {"title":"Unaware","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Whenever the user attacks, they ignore all positive Combat Stages to the target\u2019s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.6"}}

Marvel Scale.embed: {"title":"Marvel Scale","description":"When Asleep, Paralyzed, Burned, Frozen or Poisoned, Marvel Scale raises the user's Defense by +2 Combat Stages. The Combat Stages return to normal if the user is cured of their status affliction.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.323"}}

Sound Lance.embed: {"title":"Sound Lance","description":"Connection \u2014 Supersonic. The target of Supersonic loses Hit Points equal to the user's Special Attack. This occurs even if Supersonic misses.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2- Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses Supersonic"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Unbreakable.embed: {"title":"Unbreakable","description":"The user gains Last Chance with Steel.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.334"}}

Gluttony.embed: {"title":"Gluttony","description":"The user may have up to three Food Buffs at once, use up to three Food Buffs per Scene, and may eat two refreshments per half hour.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Huge Power.embed: {"title":"Huge Power","description":"The user's Base Attack Stat is increased by +5, and by +1 more for every 10 Levels the user has. This Ability cannot be disabled in any way.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Rough Skin.embed: {"title":"Rough Skin","description":"The attacker loses a tick of Hit Points.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will - Free Action, Reaction"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a damaging Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.328"}}

Heat Mirage.embed: {"title":"Heat Mirage","description":"The user's Evasion is increased by +3 until the beginning of their next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses a Fire-Type Move"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

Ugly.embed: {"title":"Ugly","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's Moves Flinch Targets on a roll of 19+. If a move already has a chance of Flinching foes, the Effect Range is increased by +2 instead. During the Introduction Stage of a Contest using this Pok\u00e9mon, any 6s that are rolled instead count as 1s.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.334"}}

Mud Dweller.embed: {"title":"Mud Dweller","description":"The user resists Ground-Type and Water-Type attacks one step further.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.324"}}

Sand Stream.embed: {"title":"Sand Stream","description":"The Weather changes to a Sandstorm for 1 full round.\nThe user is immune to Hit Point loss from Sandstorms.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.9"}}

No Guard.embed: {"title":"No Guard","description":"The user gains a +3 bonus to all Attack Rolls; however all foes gain a +3 Bonus on Attack Rolls against the user.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Grass Pelt.embed: {"title":"Grass Pelt","description":"The user gains two ticks worth of Temporary Hit Points.\nBonus:When standing on any grassy or leafy terrain that is either Slow or Rough Terrain, the user gains +5 Damage Reduction. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.5"}}

Sweet Veil.embed: {"title":"Sweet Veil","description":"The user and allies within 3 meters are immune to Sleep. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.332"}}

Synchronize.embed: {"title":"Synchronize","description":"The foe which caused the Status Condition is given the same Status they inflicted.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is Paralyzed, Frozen, Burned, Poisoned, or put to Sleep."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.332"}}

Ambush.embed: {"title":"Ambush","description":"The user may activate this Ability to use a Move with a Damage Base of 6 (before applying STAB or other modifiers) or lower as if it had the Priority keyword. If it hits, the target is Flinched and has a -2 penalty to Accuracy Rolls for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Ice Shield.embed: {"title":"Ice Shield","description":"The user places up to 3 segments of Ice Wall; each segment must be continuous with another segment, and at least one must be adjacent to the user. These Ice Walls count as Blocking Terrain and last until the end of the encounter or until they are destroyed. Each Ice Wall segment is 2 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 2 centimeters thick. Each segment has 10 Hit Points, 5 Damage Reduction, and takes damage as if it was Ice- Type.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action, Interrupt"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

Beautiful.embed: {"title":"Beautiful","description":"The user may activate Beautiful to either gain +2 Beauty Dice in a Contest, or to gain +1 Special Attack Combat Stage and cure all allies within 5 meters of the Enraged Condition.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Standard Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.3"}}

Rivalry.embed: {"title":"Rivalry","description":"Whenever the user deals direct damage to a target of the same gender, increase the Damage dealt by +5.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.328"}}

Unnerve.embed: {"title":"Unnerve","description":"Foes within 3 meters of you cannot gain positive Combat Stages or trade in Digestion Buffs. This does not affect any Combat Stages they already have.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.11"}}

Weaponize.embed: {"title":"Weaponize","description":"While being wielded as a Living Weapon and being actively Commanded as a Pok\u00e9mon, the user may Intercept for its Wielder as a Free Action.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.335"}}

Slow Start.embed: {"title":"Slow Start","description":"For 3 rounds after joining an encounter, the user's Speed and Attack Stats are halved and they have 10 Damage Reduction.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.330"}}

Defy Death.embed: {"title":"Defy Death","description":"The user instantly removes up to three injuries, and gains a Tick of Hit Points for each injury removed this way. Defy Death may be used to cure up to three Injuries per day. Injuries removed this way do not count towards the total number of injuries that can be healed per day.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Swift Action"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.4"}}

Stench.embed: {"title":"Stench","description":"The Pok\u00e9mon's Moves Flinch Targets on a roll of 18+. If a move already has a chance of Flinching foes, the Range is increased by +3 instead. Whenever the user Flinches a foe with an attack, that foe gains a -2 penalty to Accuracy Rolls for 1 full round.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.10"}}

Polycephaly.embed: {"title":"Polycephaly","description":"The user may make Struggle Attacks as a Swift Action. Struggle Attacks made this way are resisted one step further than they normally would be.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.326"}}

Deep Sleep.embed: {"title":"Deep Sleep","description":"When asleep, this Pok\u00e9mon restores a Tick of Hit Points at the end of each turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.315"}}

Bulletproof.embed: {"title":"Bulletproof","description":"The user resists all X target ranged attacks one step further. This refers to attacks and Moves that simply hit one target or specify hitting multiple targets, such as Razor Wind hitting three targets. It has no effect on Moves that are capable of hitting multiple targets through areas of effect, such as Bursts or Cones. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.313"}}

Magma Armor.embed: {"title":"Magma Armor","description":"Whenever a foe hits you with a Melee Attack or ends their turn grappling you, they lose a tick of Hit Points. Foes immune to Burn do not suffer this effect.\nBonus: The user cannot be Frozen. Defensive.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.6"}}

Magnet Pull.embed:
{"title":"Magnet Pull","description":"Pick Two Effects:
- The target is pushed or pulled X meters directly away or towards the user. X is up to 6 meters minus the target's Weight Class.
- Until the end of the user's next turn, the target may not move more then 6 meters away from the user .
- Until the end of the user's next turn, the target may not move closer than 3 meters ot the user.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x3 — Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Steel-Type Pokémon within 6 meters"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Helper.embed: {"title":"Helper","description":"Connection - Helping Hand. Whenever the user uses a Move that targets a single Ally, that Ally gains a +1 Bonus to Accuracy and Skill Checks until the end of the user's next turn.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Static"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.320"}}

Flame Tongue.embed: {"title":"Flame Tongue","description":"Connection \u2014 Lick. The foe hit with Lick gains an Injury and becomes Burned.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits a foe with Lick."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.317"}}

Migraine.embed: {"title":"Migraine","description":"Connection - Confusion. Confusion automatically gives its target the Confusion Affliction and is a Critical Hit.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2 - Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user hits with Confusion while at 50% Hit Points or less"}],"footer":{"text":"Feb.: p.7"}}

Gooey.embed: {"title":"Gooey","description":"The triggering attacker has their Speed lowered by 1 Combat Stage.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user is hit by a Melee Attack"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.319"}}

Hay Fever.embed: {"title":"Hay Fever","description":"The user creates a Burst 2 or Close Blast 3 of allergenic pollen. All Trainers and Pok\u00e9mon in the burst that are not Bug, Grass, or Poison Typed lose a Tick of Hit Points. This Ability cannot be activated in Rainy Weather, Sandstorms, or if it is Hailing.","fields":[{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will \u2014 Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"The user uses a Status Move; or the user ends their turn while Asleep."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.319"}}
